trends: There have been no other sightings in Inkocopah
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend went to a concert in San Diego and after we were driving backto the Imperial Valley. We were just listening to music and talking about theconcert and just being loud when all of a sudden we just stopped talking andthen i saw something in the air. at first i didnt know what to make of it. ididnt say anything about it until about 15 seconds later. i asked Brian if hehad seen that and he said that he did. i wanted to stop the car so we can see itbetter but i decided to just keep going because there was no place to pull over.this is what i saw i saw this spider-like type of aircraft. thats the best wayto describe it. it had just a little body on the top like a spider has and ithad what looked like thin legs coming down and each leg had some lightsconnected to the leg. i can draw it out for you if youd like. Brian saw the samething too. i just called him earlier to verify what he saw and he said exactlywhat i wrote. he also added something that i didnt see. he saw what looked likea kite top. i guess i was a little to excited to see it that i didnt pay muchattention. i was just in shock that i saw this. feel free to get in touch withme through e-mail and me and Brian will try to answer any of your questions.Thank You,Raul Felician xkillaklownx@lycos.com
Summary: saw a spider-like type of aircraft
